reviewText: Unfortunately, this series includes a lot of immaturity, flirtation, sensuality, sarcasm, foul speech, bullying, and off color jokes. One of the main characters has trouble saying anything nice at all. The two main female characters are given clothing and body movements (despite being animated) that are clearly intended to be provocative. Another main character has a "time travel" machine labeled "Little Wizard" that is "in your face" for extended periods throughout each movie in this series. Please see the video review for specifics. None of this is necessary in order to Learn Our History. Shame on the producer.
Inaccurate version, leaves out many facts, poor graphics. Children who watch will learn to not trust adults because they don't tell the truth.
Excellent Dvd series my family enjoys them.
I ordered Learn Our History: Columbus and the Great Discovery, but instead received Learn Our History: Birth of a Nation. In short, I did not receive what I had ordered.
